headline: GRANVILLE PHILLIPS CONVECTRON GAUGE CONTROLLER
description: 316 Series Convectron Gauge Controller    Granville Phillips 316 Convectron Vacuum Gauge Controller allows you to measure pressure at six points in a vacuum system simultaneously.
specstable:
Manufacturer Granville Phil
Model 316035 or 316046
Description Convectron Gauge Controller
Gauge Types Controlled Convectron
Cables Included No
Other Information
  • Two 316016 dual Convectron modules
  • Two 316015 single Convectron modules
  • Provides power and outputs analog signal from 6 convectron gauges
  • 316035 has phone jack output signal connector
  • 316046 has BNC output signal connector
Gauge and cables are not included (inquire about availability)
Power Requirements 115 V
Exterior Dimensions
Width 9.250 in (23.5 cm)
Depth 11.000 in (27.9 cm)
Height 3.500 in (8.9 cm)
Weight 15 lb (7 kg)
